Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Project Initial Setup" --body "## Overview
Initial setup and foundation for Crypto AI Platform

## Tasks
- [x] Create GitHub repository
- [ ] Update README.md
- [ ] Create environment variables setup guide
- [ ] Configure CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Setup deployment

## Priority
High" --label "setup,priority:high")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Project Initial Setup" --body "## Overview
Initial setup and foundation for Crypto AI Platform

## Tasks
- [x] Create GitHub repository
- [ ] Update README.md
- [ ] Create environment variables setup guide
- [ ] Configure CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Setup deployment

## Priority
High")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Implement 85 Learning Lessons Content" --body "## Overview
Implement comprehensive learning content system with 85 lessons

## Categories to Implement
- [ ] Financial Literacy (2 lessons)
- [ ] Cryptocurrency Basics (12 lessons)
- [ ] Trading Basics (20 lessons)
- [ ] DeFi and NFT (17 lessons)
- [ ] Advanced Investment Strategies (34 lessons)

## Technical Requirements
- [ ] Lesson data structure implementation
- [ ] Progress tracking system
- [ ] Quiz and assessment system
- [ ] Achievement badges
- [ ] Learning streaks tracking

## Priority
High")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "AI Integration - OpenAI and Anthropic Setup" --body "## Overview
Integrate AI services for intelligent investment advice and analysis

## AI Services to Integrate
- [ ] OpenAI GPT-4 integration
- [ ] Anthropic Claude integration
- [ ] Google Gemini integration
- [ ] Volt Agent implementation

## Features
- [ ] AI-powered chat assistant
- [ ] Market sentiment analysis
- [ ] Price prediction models
- [ ] Portfolio optimization recommendations
- [ ] Risk assessment AI

## Technical Tasks
- [ ] API key management system
- [ ] Rate limiting implementation
- [ ] Response caching
- [ ] Error handling and fallbacks

## Priority
High")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Security Implementation and Hardening" --body "## Overview
Implement comprehensive security measures for production deployment

## Security Tasks
- [ ] Environment variables encryption
- [ ] API key rotation system
- [ ] Rate limiting (DDoS protection)
- [ ] CSRF protection
- [ ] XSS prevention
- [ ] SQL injection prevention
- [ ] Input validation schemas

## Authentication & Authorization
- [ ] JWT token management
- [ ] Role-based access control (RBAC)
- [ ] Session management
- [ ] Password policies
- [ ] 2FA implementation

## Monitoring
- [ ] Security audit logging
- [ ] Intrusion detection
- [ ] Error tracking (Sentry)
- [ ] Performance monitoring

## Priority
Critical")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Database Schema and Supabase Configuration" --body "## Overview
Setup and optimize database schema with Supabase

## Database Tables
- [ ] users table with RLS policies
- [ ] user_lesson_progress tracking
- [ ] user_quiz_attempts history
- [ ] user_achievements badges
- [ ] user_learning_streaks
- [ ] market_data real-time storage
- [ ] risk_profiles management
- [ ] portfolio_holdings tracking

## Optimization Tasks
- [ ] Create proper indexes
- [ ] Implement Row Level Security (RLS)
- [ ] Setup database migrations
- [ ] Connection pooling configuration
- [ ] Query optimization
- [ ] N+1 query prevention

## Real-time Features
- [ ] Real-time market data subscriptions
- [ ] Live portfolio updates
- [ ] Alert notifications

## Priority
High")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Testing Infrastructure and Quality Assurance" --body "## Overview
Implement comprehensive testing strategy

## Testing Types
- [ ] Unit tests with Jest
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] E2E tests with Playwright
- [ ] Performance testing
- [ ] Security testing
- [ ] Load testing

## Test Coverage Goals
- [ ] Code coverage > 80%
- [ ] Critical functions > 95%
- [ ] All API endpoints tested
- [ ] All UI components tested
- [ ] All user flows E2E tested

## CI/CD Integration
- [ ] Automated test runs on PR
- [ ] Test result reporting
- [ ] Coverage reports
- [ ] Performance benchmarks

## Priority
High")

Bash(cmd.exe /c gh issue create --repo daisuke-ishikawa11/crypto-ai-platform --title "Market Data Integration and Real-time Updates" --body "## Overview
Integrate multiple market data sources for real-time cryptocurrency information

## Data Sources
- [ ] Binance API integration
- [ ] CoinGecko API
- [ ] CoinMarketCap API
- [ ] WebSocket connections for real-time data

## Features
- [ ] Real-time price updates
- [ ] Market cap tracking
- [ ] Volume analysis
- [ ] Price charts (1h, 24h, 7d, 30d)
- [ ] Top movers identification
- [ ] Market sentiment indicators

## Technical Requirements
- [ ] Data caching strategy
- [ ] Rate limit management
- [ ] Fallback data sources
- [ ] Data normalization

## Priority
High")
Bash(do sed -i 's/const supabase = createClient()/const supabase = await createClient()/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/const supabase = await createClient();/const supabase = createClient();/g' "$file")
